structure.unit: PHYSICIANS, OSTEOPATHS, PODIATRISTS, AND RELATED MEDICAL PRACTITIONERS

law.text: The revocation or suspension of any license shall be noted upon the records of the board, and a revoked license shall be marked as canceled upon the date of its revocation. The board shall, upon entry of an order of suspension or revocation, transmit to the county clerk of the county in which the license affected by the order is recorded, a certified copy of the order, which shall be recorded in the same manner and the same book in which the record of the license is kept.
